name: Simple receiving ASN State Machine
desc: In this simple example, we receive an inbound shipment to see how that affects the expected quantity.

states.name: ASN Expected
states.desc: We are expecting an ASN and the quantity shows us this in expected. This is typically the initial state.

resultState.name: ASN received and counted
resultState.desc: Inbound shipment received at our loading dock and has been counted and put away for waving.

actions.name: Manual Inventory Removal
actions.desc: Action to remove an entry from the inventory - possible on all states

actions.name: Manual Inventory Removal
actions.desc: Action to remove an entry from the inventory - possible on all states

states.name: ASN received and counted
states.desc: Inbound shipment received at our loading dock and has been counted and put away for waving.

actions.name: Manual Inventory Removal
actions.desc: Action to remove an entry from the inventory - possible on all states

currentState.name: ASN received and counted
currentState.desc: Inbound shipment received at our loading dock and has been counted and put away for waving.

actions.name: Manual Inventory Removal
actions.desc: Action to remove an entry from the inventory - possible on all states
